interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 2PCS Hair Clips Hairpin Headwear Styling Tools Double Layer Twist Plait Tools Hairstyle Hair Twister Clip Multi-Layer Hollow Woven Double Bangs for Knitting Hair Review Date: 2020/09/10 Store: ZDU Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ZDU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthdays', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.68 x 2.4 x 1.06 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: The pack comes with 2 twister clips, one longer and other shorter than that. The longer clip can be used on entire hair or for some strands of hair whereas the smaller clip is designed for a few strands of hair only. Various styles of hair can be made using these clips.
How to use
First put the clip on the hair, then take few strands of hair, twist and fit each bunch of hair inside the little clips above the main clip and close to create cool hair pattern and style.
Final hair looks really cool as in the pictures. These clips are great for everyday use. Review Title: Useful to create cool hair style.. Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Conair Quick Twist; Bonus Pack Conair ['Create quick, fun, styles with the Conair Quick Twist Bonus Pack. The Quick Twist Bonus Pack makes it easy to create beautiful, colorful twisty braids in seconds. Get creative and get your twist on! The Quick Twist allows you to create perfect braids in just 3 easy steps. First, push up the button to raise the hair clasp. Insert end of hair strand under and release button. Repeat on either side. Pull strands away from head and slide switch up to rotate twists. Lastly, rotate by hand, in the direction of the arrow on the styler, to create a perfect twisty braid. Twist it all together by adding ribbons, beads and elastics for totally twisted one-of-a-kind styles you create yourself. The Quick Twist Bonus includes 40 Scunci anti-slip mini elastics, 2 silky ribbons and 10 hair clips, 2 silky threads, 10 large hair clips, 1 strand of pearls, 1 sequin ribbon, 1 Conair Wet Dry Detangling Brush, 1 Conair Section and Style Comb, 2 Scunci Silicone Headbands, 4 Scunci Solid Knotted Ponytailers and 4 Scunci Animal Print Knotted Ponytailers. Requires 2 AA batteries (not included).'] {'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 4 x 9.88 inches; 13.86 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CD205TV', 'UPC': '074108332424', 'Manufacturer': 'Conair'} Pros:-
1)It makes twists of hair in braids that are cool, beautiful & trendy.
2) It is good for creating hair patterns for parties and special occasions.
3) The kit includes 40 anti-slip mini elastics, 2 silky ribbons and 10 hair clips.
4) The product runs with 2 AA batteries that is not included in the package.
Cons:-
One has to twist it by hand for 2 stranded twists. Works ok.. Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) OLEWELL {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} This pack comes with 1000 multi colored and 1000 black rubber bands. They stretch well and can accommodate all the hair without pulling or damaging it. They can be used to tie at the end of a braid or for pony tails. They are colorful and could be matched with the dress color. For a simpler look, you could go with the black bands. They are a great hair ties especially for girls would love them. They came in a bulk pack that would last for a long time. Stretchy colorful hair bands.. Qiray Hair Ties Hair Accessories Set For Girls and Women,Large Retractable Cotton,18 Colors 36 Pieces. Qiray {'Material': 'Cotton', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.51 x 1.57 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.51 x 1.57 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582479'} The pack comes with 18 pairs of hair bands of multicolors. These bands are colorful and pretty. They are a great hair accessory for girls. They can match the color of the hair bands with their dress color. There is a huge variety of colors to choose from. Every color comes with a pair in order to provide for 2 pony tails or 2 braids. For such a huge pack, the price is reasonable. It forms a great hair band set to mix and match the colors as per the attire. Mega pack of colorful hair ties to mix and match... Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces. Qiray {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'} These hair ties look stunning with woven pearls. They could be used on pony tails as well as plaits. They come in 5 different colors and have 2 of each color. They are grand and would be apt for parties and special occasions. They come in a nice box to be stored after use.Price is very good for this set. I would definitely recommend it. Stunning hair ties.. obmwang 10 Pieces Metal Headband for Women's Hair, Hair Hoop Spring Wavy Hair Band Non-Slip Headwear Hair Accessories for Women Girls Men (Multicolor) obmwang {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic, Metal', 'Brand': 'Obmwang', 'Item Form': 'Wrap', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 7 x 2.1 inches; 7.2 Ounces'} The first thing that I noticed when I opened the pack was the size of these hair bands. They are large and would fit any head type. They stretch well and hold the hair firmly. Interior part of the headband is smooth and does not prick or pull the hair. They look simple in wavy pattern yet very useful especially when you leave the hair open, so that hair strands do not fall on your face. They come in so many colors, you could mix and mach your dresses with them. It comes individually wrapped so that you could also gift them. The price is good for this 10 pack set. Stretchable headband with smooth interiors AOFLLU Hair Clips for Girls, 120 Pcs No Slip Metal Snap Hair Clips Barrettes for Girls Kids Women AOFLLU {'Brand': 'AOFLLU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Occasion': "Christmas, Valentine's Day", 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.9 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} The first thing I noticed after getting these clips is how cute they were. They come in 30 different colors and are in plenty so that you could literally match with any dress color. They are soft when snapped to hair and won’t prick. They look so colorful. This is a value for money clip set. Girls would love them! Cute and colorful snap clips..girls would love them! 2PCS Hair Clips Hairpin Headwear Styling Tools Double Layer Twist Plait Tools Hairstyle Hair Twister Clip Multi-Layer Hollow Woven Double Bangs for Knitting Hair ZDU {'Brand': 'ZDU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthdays', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.68 x 2.4 x 1.06 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} The pack comes with 2 twister clips, one longer and other shorter than that. The longer clip can be used on entire hair or for some strands of hair whereas the smaller clip is designed for a few strands of hair only. Various styles of hair can be made using these clips.
How to use
First put the clip on the hair, then take few strands of hair, twist and fit each bunch of hair inside the little clips above the main clip and close to create cool hair pattern and style.
Final hair looks really cool as in the pictures. These clips are great for everyday use. Useful to create cool hair style..
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user remains dedicated to hair styling as an artistic pursuit, focusing on innovative and eye-catching accessories tailored for special occasions. They strive to balance trendiness with practicality.

- **Product Preferences:** Recent acquisitions reflect a continued favor for colorful and multifunctional hair accessories. The user appreciates products that allow for diverse styling options, enhancing personal expression while prioritizing usability.

- **Usage Context:** There is a clear inclination towards accessories that marry aesthetic charm with excellent hair management, particularly for artistic looks suited for events like weddings and birthdays. Their focus lies on items that support both stylishness and hair health.

- **Performance Expectation:** The user's standards for performance are high, as evidenced by their consistent preference for visually appealing, functional accessories. They seek products that enhance usability without sacrificing vibrant design.

- **Ratings Insight:** Their latest ratings reveal a positive trend, showcasing a strong preference for practical, visually stimulating items that facilitate creative styling through versatile applications.

- **User Engagement Style:** The user exhibits a discerning taste for color and design, illustrating a persistent search for stylish, functional solutions. They are dedicated to achieving distinctive hairstyles and actively pursue accessories that offer a blend of form and function appropriate for varied occasions. 

This updated summary reflects the user’s evolving tastes for practical yet attractive hair accessories while staying aligned with their established interests.
